statements: SELECT symbol, date, close_price FROM stock_price_predictions WHERE date = '2022-08-01';
SELECT * FROM stock_price_predictions WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT symbol, open_price, close_price FROM stock_price_predictions WHERE close_price > 100 ORDER BY close_price ASC;
SELECT * FROM stock_price_predictions WHERE volume > 1000000 AND date BETWEEN '2022-07-01' AND '2022-07-31';
SELECT AVG(close_price) AS average_close_price FROM stock_price_predictions WHERE symbol = 'AMZN';
SELECT symbol, date, close_price FROM stock_price_predictions WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT date, symbol, open_price, close_price, high_price, low_price FROM stock_price_predictions WHERE date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT symbol, date, open_price, high_price, low_price FROM stock_price_predictions WHERE close_price > 100 AND volume > 1000000 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT symbol, date, high_price FROM stock_price_predictions WHERE symbol IN ('AAPL', 'GOOGL') AND date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY high_price DESC;
SELECT date, AVG(open_price) AS avg_open_price, AVG(close_price) AS avg_close_price FROM stock_price_predictions GROUP BY date HAVING AVG(open_price) > 50 AND AVG(close_price) > 50 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM time_series_data;
SELECT timestamp, opening_price, closing_price FROM time_series_data WHERE stock_symbol='AAPL';
SELECT stock_symbol, high_price, low_price FROM time_series_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM model_results WHERE accuracy > 0.8;
SELECT result_id, prediction_result FROM model_results WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND stock_symbol='GOOGL';
SELECT timestamp, closing_price FROM time_series_data WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT stock_symbol, AVG(high_price) AS average_high_price FROM time_series_data GROUP BY stock_symbol;
SELECT stock_symbol, opening_price, closing_price FROM time_series_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY opening_price DESC, closing_price ASC;
SELECT * FROM model_results WHERE accuracy > 0.8 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT AVG(accuracy) AS average_accuracy, MAX(accuracy) AS max_accuracy FROM model_results GROUP BY stock_symbol;
SELECT * FROM stock_prices ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT stock_id, open_price, close_price FROM stock_prices WHERE volume > 100000 ORDER BY open_price ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT news_date, headline FROM stock_news ORDER BY news_date DESC, headline ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT stock_id, prediction_date, predicted_movement, confidence_level FROM stock_predictions WHERE predicted_movement = 'UP' ORDER BY prediction_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT stock_id, date, open_price, close_price FROM stock_prices WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date <= '2022-02-28' ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT stock_id, open_price, close_price FROM stock_prices;
SELECT stock_id, MAX(open_price) AS max_open_price, MIN(close_price) AS min_close_price FROM stock_prices GROUP BY stock_id;
SELECT stock_id, prediction_date, predicted_movement, confidence_level FROM stock_predictions WHERE confidence_level > 0.8;
SELECT sp.stock_id, sp.date, sp.open_price, sn.headline FROM stock_prices sp JOIN stock_news sn ON sp.stock_id = sn.stock_id WHERE sp.date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT sn.news_date, sn.headline, sp.close_price, sp.volume FROM stock_news sn JOIN stock_prices sp ON sn.stock_id = sp.stock_id ORDER BY sn.news_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM stock_prices ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT date, symbol, close_price FROM stock_prices WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT symbol, open_price, close_price, volume FROM stock_prices WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT date, symbol, rsi, macd FROM technical_indjsonicators WHERE rsi > 70 AND macd < 0;
SELECT date, symbol, prediction FROM model_predictions ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM stock_prices ORDER BY symbol, date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT symbol, close_price FROM stock_prices WHERE date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY close_price DESC;
SELECT symbol, open_price, close_price, volume FROM stock_prices WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' AND volume > 1000000;
SELECT date, rsi, macd FROM technical_indicators WHERE symbol = 'GOOGL' ORDER BY date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT date, positive_sentiment, total_news FROM news_sentiment WHERE negative_sentiment < 0.4 AND total_news > 50 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM stock_prices LIMIT 10;
SELECT stock_id, date, close_price FROM stock_prices WHERE volume > 100000 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT date, open_price, high_price, low_price, close_price FROM stock_prices WHERE stock_id = 1001;
SELECT date, feature_name, feature_value FROM features_data WHERE feature_name LIKE 'macro%' AND feature_value > 0;
SELECT prediction_id, date, predicted_direction, confidence FROM predicted_movements WHERE confidence >= 0.6 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM stock_prices WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND volume > 10000 ORDER BY date DESC, close_price ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT stock_id, date, high_price, low_price, close_price FROM stock_prices WHERE stock_id = 1001 AND date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY date ASC, high_price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT date, feature_name, feature_value FROM features_data WHERE date = '2022-04-15' ORDER BY feature_value DESC, feature_name ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT movement_id, date, movement_type FROM stock_movements WHERE date = '2022-05-20' AND movement_type = 'Increase' ORDER BY movement_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT date, model_name, accuracy FROM model_results WHERE accuracy >= 90.00 ORDER BY accuracy DESC, date ASC LIMIT 5;
